verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Shall we <S%G1961>continue<s%> in <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> may <S%G4121>abound<s%>?

for <S%G1063><s%> he that hath <S%G599>died<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G599>died<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, we <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G4800>shall<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> live <S%G4800>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>;

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2961>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have dominion <S%G2961>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5485>thanks<s%> be to <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, whereas ye <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G1161><s%> ye became <S%G5219>obedient<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> that <S%G5179>form<s%> of <S%G1322>teaching<s%> <S%G3739>whereunto<s%> ye were <S%G3860>delivered<s%>;
